Articles.Content:
I apologize if this is the wrong board. I'm kind of confused.

On a whim, I decided to make a short video showing the sorts of things that can be done using Kerbcom Avionics, by ZRM. In my opinion, it came out quite nicely, and I thought I'd share it for anyone who might be interested. If you're the sort of person who gets bored easily, feel free to skip ahead.

Roughly two minutes in is where I figure out how to fly the thing properly.
